Query: SELECT * FROM hotell where nimi = "Viru";
SELECT DISTINCT nimi FROM hotell GROUP BY NIMI;
SELECT * FROM hotell h JOIN reserveerimine r ON r.hotelli_nr = h.hotelli_nr JOIN külaline k ON k.külalise_nr = r.külalise_nr;
SELECT * FROM Ruum UNION SELECT * FROM Ruum_koopia;
SELECT Hotell.hotelli_nr, nimi, Count(Reserveerimine.hotelli_nr) AS arv FROM Reserveerimine JOIN Hotell ON Hotell.hotelli_nr = Reserveerimine.hotelli_nr;
SELECT Hotell.hotelli_nr, nimi, Count(Reserveerimine.hotelli_nr) AS arv FROM Reserveerimine LEFT JOIN Hotell ON Hotell.hotelli_nr = Reserveerimine.hotelli_nr GROUP BY Hotell.hotelli_nr, nimi;
SELECT hotelli_nr, ruumi_nr, Count(külalise_nr) as külalineCount from Reserveerimine group by hotelli_nr;
INSERT INTO Hotell VALUES (999, 'TOP', 'Tallinn');
INSERT INTO Külaline_koopia SELECT * FROM Külaline;
SELECT nimi FROM Külaline ORDER BY 1
SELECT ruumi_tüüp, hind FROM ruum GROUP BY ruumi_tüüp, hind HAVING hind > 10;
SELECT ruumi_tüüp, sum(hind) FROM ruum GROUP BY ruumi_tüüp, hind HAVING (linn='TALLINN' OR nimi='Tartu' AND hotelli_nr=2);
SELECT * FROM Hotell HAVING linn = 'Tallinn' OR 'Tartu' OR hind BETWEEN 8 AND 9;
SELECT hotelli_nr, Count(*) AS arv FROM Reserveerimine GROUP BY Count(*);
SELECT linn, nimi as linn AS arv FROM Hotell;
SELECT * FROM Hotell WHERE linn = 'Tallinn' OR 'Tartu' OR hind BETWEEN 8 AND 9;
SELECT ruumi_tüüp, sum(hind) FROM ruum WHERE (linn='TALLINN' OR nimi='Tartu' AND hotelli_nr=2) GROUP BY ruumi_tüüp, hind;
SELECT hotelli_nr, Count(*) AS arv FROM Reserveerimine WHERE Count(*) > 1;
SELECT * from Hotell where nimi = 'nimi' and where linn='Tallinn';
SELECT nimi, (SELECT max(hind) FROM ruum where ruum.hotelli_nr = Hotell.hotelli_nr) from Hotell where nimi = 'Viru' and linn='Tallinn';
SELECT nimi, 'ilus', linn FROM Hotell;

SELECT nimi, (SELECT 'ilus' FROM ruum where ruum.hotelli_nr = Hotell.hotelli_nr) from Hotell where nimi = 'Viru' and linn='Tallinn' and ruumi_nr in (SELECT 1 FROM ruum where ruum.hotelli_nr = Hotell.hotelli_nr);
SELECT Sum(1) AS arv FROM Hotell
SELECT * FROM Hotell WHERE
SELECT ruumi_tüüp, hind FROM ruum GROUP BY ruumi_tüüp, hind HAVING;
SELECT * FROM Hotell JOIN Ruum ON x.id = y.id
SELECT * FROM Hotell WHERE hotelli_nr_1 IN (SELECT hotelli_nr_2 FROM Reserveerimine ORDER BY hotelli_nr_3);
